assignee.description: The user who is assigned to this task.

is_service.description:
Optional flat to indicate that the assignee is a service, not a user. Can be used to prevent the assignee being
changed.

name.description: Optional name of the user assigned, should be added if known.

description.description: An optional description of the task.

state.description: Custom state, can change during the tasks lifecycle.

status.description: A number representing the status of the task. 0 - not started, 1 - accepted, 2 - in progress, 3 - done, -1 - errored, 4+ custom.

status_text.description: Short text to describe the status code.
